name: Ciderhunk: 1877
description:
Controls: WASD - Move Space - Jump Arrow Keys - Attacks, each corresponding to the direction they face About:

In game jams I like to take the theme and use it in an unexpected way.  Using the word dreamy, I spun it in the sense of a person who is dreamy.  Thus I wanted a game starring a hunk that saves the day.  With the limitation of being different every time, I thought the most interesting path was adding rogue-like elements to the game.  These come in the form of drops from enemies and chests that boost certain stats or give new attacks.  I worked on this for about a day and a half and I think it turned out pretty cool.
